org.jplot2d.element

Interface RectangleAnnotation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Annotation, Element, MovableComponent, PComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RectangleAnnotationEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RectangleAnnotationImpl

    public interface RectangleAnnotation
extends Annotation
    A rectangle annotation to highlight an area defined by horizontal and vertical ranges.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the Paint to be used to fill the annotation rectangle.

      • setFillPaint

        void setFillPaint(java.awt.Paint stroke)
        Sets the Paint to be used to fill the annotation rectangle. The default paint is semi-transparent grey Color(192, 192, 192, 128).
        Parameters:
        stroke - the Paint to be used to fill the annotation rectangle
